## RemirrorPortals variable

The component that places all the portals into the DOM.

Portals can be created by NodeView and also the static widget method on Decorations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
RemirrorPortals: ({ portalContainer }: RemirrorPortalsProps) => JSX.Element
```
